title: Haven't received the snow scuttler icon....
body: Have sent two gifts now the past 2 days and I have yet to obtain the icon... Does it take some time to activate?

replies.body: We're aiming to get these Scuttler Icons sent out around **January 23rd**. If you don't have it by then, please let us know in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ^.^
